title: Rewrite
text: Let's try to rewrite this in equation form. We can make our variable $$x$$ where $$x$$ $$=$$ the number of days

title: Rewrite
text: We can rewrite it to be f(x) $$=$$ $$60x$$ because that is how many texts are sent each day

title: Checking for if function is increasing, decreasing, or constant.
text: To see if our function is increasing, decreasing, or constant, we have to check the slope. Is the slope positive, constant, or negative?

title: Checking for if function is increasing, decreasing, or constant.
text: We see that $$60$$ is positive which means our function is increasing
